免疫基因表达通过生物信息学揭示的心肌梗塞的变化宣布了有关心血管创新和应用杂志的新文章出版物。这项研究旨在通过全面的生物信息学方法探索与免疫相关的基因及其在心肌梗塞（MI）中的表达变化，并将这些基因验证为潜在的诊断和治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250208/immune-gene-expression-changes-in-mycardial-infarcortion-revealed-through-through-bioinformatics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250208/immune-gene-expression-changes-changes-in-mycardial-infarcorction-revealed-through-through-bioineformatics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f94418dd-a8f2-4106-ba7c-be648e39ba6b Sat, 08 Feb 2025 21:49:00 -0500 Immune gene expression changes in myocardial infarction revealed through bioinformatics
